name: Garlic Butter Mushrooms
description: Simple, elegant yet so stinking easy. It’s practically fool-proof! An essential side dish to all your meals!
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly oil a baking sheet or coat with nonstick spray.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly oil a baking sheet or coat with nonstick spray.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine butter and garlic; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine butter and garlic; season with salt and pepper, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Working one at a time, spread butter mixture into each of the mushroom cavities; sprinkle with Parmesan.
recipeInstructions.name: Working one at a time, spread butter mixture into each of the mushroom cavities; sprinkle with Parmesan.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mushrooms onto the preparing baking sheet, cap-side down. Place into oven and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the cheese has melted.
recipeInstructions.name: Place mushrooms onto the preparing baking sheet, cap-side down. Place into oven and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the cheese has melted.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with parsley, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with parsley, if desired.

review.reviewBody: Absolutely delicious! Thank you! I prepped everything the night before in a metal, BBQ proof IKEA dish.  BBQ was set for 375-400. I placed my metal dish on the top rank and walked away. . Cheese went on near the end and parsley right before serving. My main dish was in the oven. When ready, I brought the main dish out and served off the BBQ. Will definitely become a favourite.
I tried it for the first time garlic butter mushroom it was the best third time making it I will do it again my husband is a vegetarian and he really enjoyed it thanks again for your recipe
I love this!  I only have premade garlic butter now... Will that work with this recipe?
